import './company-add-coupon.css' import history from './../../../../../../history' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' export default function CompanyAddCoupon() { const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/company/my-coupons') } const handleSubmit = (values) => { //TODO manage coupon submit here //TODO change date format if needed console.log(values) } //today let today = new Date(); let dd = today.getDate(); let mm = today.getMonth() + 1; //January is 0! let yyyy = today.getFullYear(); if (dd < 10) { dd = '0' + dd } if (mm < 10) { mm = '0' + mm } today = yyyy + '-' + mm + '-' + dd; //today return ( <>
